<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mergeAliasSetsForMemoryLocation - Given a memory location, merge all alias</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sets that may alias it. Return the unified set, or nullptr if no aliasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// set was found. A known existing alias set for the pointer value of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// memory location can be passed in (or nullptr if not available). MustAliasAll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is updated to true/false if the memory location is found to MustAlias all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the sets it merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset">AliasSet</a> &#42;AliasSetTracker::mergeAliasSetsForMemoryLocation(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp;MemLoc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset">AliasSet</a> &#42;PtrAS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MustAliasAll) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset">AliasSet</a> &#42;FoundSet = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MustAliasAll = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset">AliasSet</a> &amp;AS : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d2cdc4a0db233678e7141c9d6ea3419">llvm::make&#95;early&#95;inc&#95;range</a>(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AS.Forward)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An alias set that already contains a memory location with the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer value is directly assumed to MustAlias; we bypass the AA query in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: it is not guaranteed that AA would always provide the same result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a known exception are undef pointer values, where alias(undef, undef) is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NoAlias, while we treat it as MustAlias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;AS != PtrAS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult">AliasResult</a> AR = AS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset/#adabf31a1b7bde50ca3445357f680d370">aliasesMemoryLocation</a>(MemLoc, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AR == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a863ee317b92588eb2d6878af9fc98922">AliasResult::NoAlias</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AR != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57ac1a99a1af9a4778a61e5cc3e1d622180">AliasResult::MustAlias</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MustAliasAll = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FoundSet) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is the first alias set ptr can go into, remember it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we must merge the sets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FoundSet-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasset/#a312b61f81f956eb27c86fa40ad60e3b3">mergeSetIn</a>(AS, &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, AA);</span></CodeLine>
